abstract: Tangled web--A Big mistake--Playing with fire
description: Episode of Series "Bad girls. Series one". Tangled web (wri. Louise Page, dir. Laurence Moody): An investigation is underway into Rachel's death and Fenner has his own agenda to attend to. Shell makes the surprise announcement that she wants to sing at the funeral. Nikki assaults Shell and Zandra's blackmailing Lorna. "A Big mistake" (wri. Tom Higgins, dir. Jim O'Hanlon): Dominic is talked out of resigning by Stewart and also has to contest with distressed new prisoner Jessie, a recovering alcoholic and manic depressive. "Playing with fire" (wri. Ann McManus, dir. Jim O'Hanlon): Zandra's under pressure from Shell to find her stash of smuggled drugs and is quick to drop in Warden Lorna Rose. Nikki moves in next door to Shell and Lorna's career is in jeopardy. Shell has her privileges stripped.
